hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Bombchus (5 pieces)# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Right

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to the #Spirit Medallion#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Zora Scale#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Bug Bottle#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Big Lava Room Lower Open Door Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #2# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #Wolfos# guarding a chest.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that Okami is the best Zelda game.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Purple Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple First Mirror Left Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Claim Check#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Zora Scale#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #the Fire Arrows# and #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Phantom Ganon# holds...^ #the Bolero of Fire# and #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #a Bow#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the Zora's Domain #diving game and torch run# lead to...^ #the Zora Sapphire# and #a Water Temple Small Key#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Claim Check#.
